definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Switch to whole-wheat couscous and pasta
sentences.chinese: 轉變去食用全麥製作的粗麥粉和通心粉。

sentences.english: On a clean work surface, place one sheet of manicotti lengthwise.
sentences.chinese: 在一張乾淨的切菜板上放一片通心粉。

sentences.english: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil, then add the pasta.
sentences.chinese: 把一大罐水加鹽煮沸，然後放入通心粉。

sentences.english: Uh, how about macaroni and cheese?
sentences.chinese: 呃，通心粉和奶酪怎麼樣？

sentences.english: The spaghetti and roast pork are making my mouth water.
sentences.chinese: 意大利通心粉和烤豬肉使我流口水了。

sentences.english: The Swiss Spaghetti Harvest hoax generated an enormous response.
sentences.chinese: 這個意大利通心粉收穫節的鬧劇引發了巨大的反響。

sentences.english: We suggest to pair the salad with either the noodle dish or the sandwich.
sentences.chinese: 建議您無論選擇通心粉還是三明治均應配以特色沙拉。

sentences.english: My friend likes to eat ziti.
At last, create your wampum by stringing purple and white macaroni.
sentences.chinese: 最後，建立您的金錢的紫色和白色的線通心粉。

sentences.english: Milan Style Macaroni. Don't put sugar or salt in it. please.
sentences.chinese: 份米蘭式通心粉，請不要放糖或鹽。

sentences.english: They tease each other and light cigarettes as they boil macaroni and brew tea.
sentences.chinese: 他們一邊煮通心粉和泡茶，一邊互相戲弄和點菸。

sentences.english: Sheldon: Elbow macaroni with ground hamburger and tomato sauce.
sentences.chinese: 曲管通心粉配牛肉醬和番茄醬。

sentences.english: Only crazy people don't want my minestrone.
sentences.chinese: 只有那些笨蛋纔不想喫我的蔬菜通心粉湯呢。

sentences.english: Boil the pasta in a saucepan of salted water for 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把意大利通心粉倒入帶蓋的鍋中用鹽水煮15分鐘。

sentences.english: This restaurant serves spaghetti, but not pizza.
sentences.chinese: 這家餐廳做通心粉，但是沒有比薩餅。

definition: pasta (abbr. for 意大利麵|意大利面[Yi4 da4 li4 mian4])/(Tw) yi mein, a variety of Cantonese egg noodle
rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
